translit: mâ bâyad be golhâ âb midâdim.

text: We had to clean the apartment.
translit: mâ bâyad âpârtemân râ moratab mikardim.

text: We had to wash the dishes.
translit: mâ bâyad zorufe ghazâ râ mishostim.

text: Did you have to pay the bill?
translate: ‫آیا شما مجبور بودید صورت حساب را پرداخت کنید؟‬
translit: âyâ shomâ majbur be pardâkhte surat-hesâb budid?

text: Did you have to pay an entrance fee?
translate: ‫آیا شما مجبور بودید ورودی را پرداخت کنید؟‬
translit: âyâ shomâ majbur be pardâkhte vorudi budid?

text: Did you have to pay a fine?
translate: ‫آیا شما مجبور بودید جریمه را پرداخت کنید؟‬
translit: âyâ shomâ majbur be pardâkhte jarime budid?

text: Who had to go home early?
translit: che kasi bâyad zud be khâne miraft?

text: Who had to take the train?
translit: che kasi bâyad bâ ghatâr miraft?

text: We did not want to stay long.

translit: va oo yek kârte postâl nevesht.

text: We did not want to drink anything.
We did not want to disturb you.
I just wanted to make a call.
I just wanted to call a taxi.
Actually I wanted to drive home.
I thought you wanted to call your wife.
translate: ‫من فکر کردم تو می‌خواستی به همسرت تلفن کنی.‬
translit: man fekr kardam to mikhâsti be hamsarat telefon koni.

text: I thought you wanted to call information.
translate: ‫من فکر کردم تو می‌خواستی به اطلاعات تلفن کنی.‬
translit: man fekr kardam to mikhâsti be etelâ-ât telefon koni.

text: I thought you wanted to order a pizza.
translate: ‫من فکر کردم تو می‌خواستی پیتزا سفارش بدهی.‬
translit: man fekr kardam to mikhâsti yek pitzâ sefâresh dahi.

text: She took a piece of chocolate.
He was disloyal, but she was loyal.
translate: ‫او (مرد) بی وفا بود، اما او (زن) با وفا بود.‬
translit: oo bivafâ bud, ammâ oo bâvafâ bud.

text: He was lazy, but she was hard-working.
translate: ‫او (مرد) تنبل بود، اما او (زن) کاری بود.‬
translit: oo tanbal bud, ammâ oo kâri bud.

text: He was poor, but she was rich.
translate: ‫او (مرد) فقیر بود، اما او (زن) ثروتمند بود.‬
translit: oo faghir bud, ammâ oo servatmand bud.

text: He had no money, only debts.
translit: oo pool nadâsht, balke bedehkâr bud.

text: He had no luck, only bad luck.
translate: ‫او (مرد) شانس نداشت، بلکه بد شانس بود.‬
translit: oo shâns nadâsht, balke bad shâns bud.

text: He had no success, only failure.
translit: oo movaf-faghiati nadâsht, balke nâmovafagh bud.

text: He was not satisfied, but dissatisfied.
translit: oo râzi nabud, balke nârâzi bud.

text: He was not happy, but sad.
translit: oo khoshbakht nabud, balke badbakht bud.

text: He was not friendly, but unfriendly.
translate: ‫او (مرد) دوست داشتنی نبود، بلکه ناخوشایند بود.‬
translit: oo khosh barkhord nabud, balke badbarkhord bud.

translate: ‫ تو کدام کراوات را زده بودی؟‬
translit: to kodâm kerâvât râ zade budi?
to kodâm khodro râ kharide budi?

text: Which newspaper did you subscribe to?
translate: ‫تو اشتراک کدام روزنامه را گرفته بودی؟‬
translit: to eshterâke kodâm rooznâme râ gerefte budi?
shomâ bâ che kasi molâghât karde-id?

translate: ‫شما کی از خواب بلند شده اید؟‬
translit: shomâ che moghe az khâb boland shode-id?

translate: ‫شما کی کار را متوقف کرده اید؟‬
translit: shomâ che moghe kâr râ motevaghef karde-id?

text: Why did you become a teacher?
Why did you take a taxi?

translit: to be che kasi komak karde-e?
to be che kasi nâme neveshte-e?
to be che kasi javâb dâde-e?

text: How did you pass the exam?
translit: shomâ chegune dar emtehân ghabul shode-id?

text: How did you find the way?
translit: shomâ chegune râh râ peydâ karde-id?
shomâ bâ che kasi sohbat karde-id?

text: With whom did you make an appointment?
translate: ‫شما با کی قرار ملاقات گذاشته اید؟‬
translit: shomâ bâ che kasi gharâre molâghât gozâshte-id?

text: With whom did you celebrate your birthday?
translate: ‫شما با کی جشن تولد گرفته اید؟‬
translit: shomâ bâ kee jashne tavalod gerefte-id?

text: What did you come to know?

translit: shomâ bâ che sor-ati rânandegi mikardid?

text: He is staying in a hotel.
translit: oo (mard) dar yek hotel zendegi mikonad.

text: He is staying in a cheap hotel.
translate: ‫او در یک هتل ارزان اقامت دارد.‬
translit: oo dar yek hotele arzân zendegi mikonad.

text: He is reading a boring novel.
translit: oo (mard) yek române khaste konande mikhânad.

text: She is watching an exciting movie.
translit: oo (zan) yek filme mohayej tamâshâ mikonad.
bâ-ese âzâre man ast ke to khoro pof mikoni.

text: I’m angry that you drink so much beer.
translit: bâ-ese âzâre man ast ke to inghadr âbe-jo minushi.

text: I’m angry that you come so late.
translit: bâ-ese âzâre man ast ke to inghadr dir mi-âyee.

text: I think he needs a doctor.
translate: ‫من فکر می‌کنم که او احتیاج به پزشک دارد.‬
translit: man fekr mikonam ke oo be yek pezeshk ehtiâj dârad.

translate: ‫من فکر می‌کنم که او مریض است.‬
translit: man fekr mikonam ke oo mariz ast.

text: I think he is sleeping now.
translate: ‫من فکر می‌کنم که او الان خوابیده است.‬
translit: man fekr mikonam ke oo alân khâbide ast.

text: We hope that he marries our daughter.
translate: ‫امیدواریم که او (مرد) با دختر ما ازدواج کند.‬
translit: mâ omidvârim ke oo bâ dokhtare mâ ezdevâj konad.

text: We hope that he has a lot of money.
translate: ‫امیدواریم که او (مرد) پول زیادی داشته باشد.‬
translit: mâ omidvârim ke oo poole ziâdi dâshte bâshad.

text: We hope that he is a millionaire.
translit: mâ omidvârim ke oo milioner bâshad.

text: I heard that your wife had an accident.
translate: ‫من شنیده ام که همسرت تصادف کرده است.‬
translit: man shenide-am ke ham-sarat tasâdof kard-e ast.

text: I heard that she is in the hospital.
translate: ‫من شنیده ام که او در بیمارستان بستری است.‬
translit: man shenide-am ke oo dar bimâarestân bastari ast.

text: I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
translate: ‫من شنیده ام که خودروی تو کاملا داغان شده است.‬
translit: man shenide-am ke khodroye to be tore kâmel kharâb shode ast.

text: I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
translit: khosh-hâlam ke shomâ mikhâ-heed khâne râ bekharid.

text: I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
translit: man negarân hastam ke âkharin otobus rafte bâshad.

text: I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
translate: ‫می‌ترسم که مجبور شویم با تاکسی برویم.‬
translit: man negarân hastam ke majbur shavim bâ tâxi beravim.

text: I’m afraid I have no more money.
translit: man negarân hastam ke pool hamrâh nadâshte bâsham.
man be tamâmi-ye soâlât pâsokh dâde-am.

text: I know that – I knew that.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌دانم – من آن را می‌دانستم.‬
translit: man ân râ midânam - man ân râ midânestam.

text: I write that – I wrote that.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌نویسم – من آن را نوشته ام.‬
translit: man ân râ minevisam - man ân râ neveshte-am.

text: I hear that – I heard that.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌شنوم – من آن را شنیده ام.‬
translit: man ân râ mishenavam - man ân râ shenide-am.

text: I’ll get it – I got it.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌گیرم – من آن را گرفته ام.‬
translit: man ân râ migiram - man ân râ gerefte-am.

text: I’ll bring that – I brought that.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌آورم – من آن را آورده ام.‬
translit: man ân râ mi-âvaram - man ân râ âvarde-am.

text: I’ll buy that – I bought that.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌خرم – من آن را خریده ام.‬
translit: man ân râ mi-kharam - man ân râ kharide-am.

text: I expect that – I expected that.
translate: ‫من منتظر آن هستم – من منتظر آن بوده ام.‬
translit: man montazere ân hastam - man montazere ân bude-am.

text: I’ll explain that – I explained that.
translate: ‫من آن را توضیح می‌دهم – من آن را توضیح داده ام.‬
translit: man ân râ tozih midaham - man ân râ tozih dâde-am.

text: I know that – I knew that.
translate: ‫من آن را می‌شناسم – من آن را می‌شناختم.‬
translit: man ân râ mishenâsam - man ân râ shenâkhte-am.

text: My son did not want to play with the doll.
translit: pesaram nemikhâst bâ arusak bâzi konad.

text: My daughter did not want to play football / soccer (am.).
My wife did not want to play chess with me.
translate: ‫همسرم نمی‌خواست با من شطرنج بازی کند.‬
translit: hamsaram nemikhâst bâ man shatranj bâzi konad.

text: My children did not want to go for a walk.
They did not want to tidy the room.
translit: ânhâ nemikhâstand otâgh râ moratab konand.

text: They did not want to go to bed.
He was not allowed to eat ice cream.
He was not allowed to eat chocolate.
He was not allowed to eat sweets.
translit: oo ejâze nadâsht âb nabât bokhorad.

text: I was allowed to make a wish.
translit: man ejâze dâshtam barâye khodam ârezu-yee bokonam.

text: I was allowed to buy myself a dress.
translate: ‫من اجازه داشتم برای خودم لباس بخرم.‬
translit: man ejâze dâshtam barâye khodam lebâs bekharam.

text: I was allowed to take a chocolate.
translate: ‫من اجازه داشتم یک شکلات مغزدار بردارم.‬
translit: man ejâze dâshtam yek shokolâte maghz-dâr bardâram.

text: Were you allowed to smoke in the airplane?
translit: ejâze dâshti dar havâ-peymâ sigâr bekeshi?

text: Were you allowed to drink beer in the hospital?
translit: ejâze dâshti dar bimârestân âbe-jo benushi?

text: Were you allowed to take the dog into the hotel?
translate: ‫اجازه داشتی سگ را با خودت به هتل ببری؟‬
translit: ejâze dâshti sag râ bâ khodat be hotel bebari?

text: During the holidays the children were allowed to remain outside late.
translate: ‫بچه‌ها در تعطیلات اجازه داشتند مدت زیادی بیرون باشند.‬
translit: bache-hâ dar tatilât ejâze dâshtand mod-date ziâdi birun bâshand.

text: They were allowed to play in the yard for a long time.
translate: ‫آنها اجازه داشتند مدت زیادی در حیاط بازی کنند.‬
translit: ânhâ ejâze dâshtand mod-date ziâdid dar hayât bâzi konand.

text: They were allowed to stay up late.
translate: ‫آنها اجازه داشتند مدت زیادی (تا دیروقت) بیدار باشند.‬
translit: ânhâ ejâze dâshtand mod-date ziâdid (tâ dir vaght) bidâr bâshand.

text: I don’t know if he loves me.
translate: ‫من نمی‌دانم آیا او (مرد) مرا دوست دارد.‬
translit: man nemidânam âyâ oo marâ dust dârad.

text: I don’t know if he’ll come back.
translit: man nemidânam âyâ oo bar migardad.

text: I don’t know if he’ll call me.
translate: ‫من نمی‌دانم آیا او (مرد) به من تلفن می‌کند.‬
translit: man nemidânam âyâ oo be man telefon mikonad.
shâyâd oo be man zang nakhâ-had zad?

text: I wonder if he thinks about me.
translate: ‫برایم سوال است که آیا او (مرد) به من فکر می‌کند.‬
translit: man az khodam miporsam âyâ oo be man fekr mikonad.

text: I wonder if he has someone else.
translate: ‫برایم سوال است که آیا او (مرد) کس دیگری را دارد.‬
translit: man az khodam miporsam âyâ oo kase digari râ dârad.

translate: ‫برایم سوال است که آیا او (مرد) دروغ می‌گوید.‬
translit: man az khodam miporsam âyâ oo doroogh migu-yad.
âyâ oo be man fekr mikonad.
âyâ oo farde digari râ dârad.

text: Maybe he tells me the truth?
I doubt whether he really likes me.
translate: ‫من تردید دارم که آیا او (مرد) مرا واقعاً دوست دارد.‬
translit: man tardid dâram ke âyâ oo marâ vâghe-an dust dârad.

text: I doubt whether he’ll write to me.
translate: ‫من تردید دارم که آیا او (مرد) برایم نامه بنویسد.‬
translit: man tardid dâram ke âyâ oo barâyam nâme benevisad.

text: I doubt whether he’ll marry me.
translate: ‫من تردید دارم که آیا او (مرد) با من ازدواج می‌کند.‬
translit: man tardid dâram ke âyâ oo bâ man ezdevâj mikonad.

translate: ‫آیا او (مرد) واقعاً از من خوشش می‌آید؟‬
translit: âyâ oo vâghe-an az man khoshash mi-âyad?

translate: ‫ آیا او (مرد) با من ازدواج می‌کند؟‬
translit: âyâ oo bâ man ezdevâj mikonad.

text: Since when is she no longer working?
translit: oo az che moghe digar kâr nemikonad?

text: Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translate: ‫بله، او از وقتی که ازدواج کرده است، دیگر کار نمی‌کند.‬
translit: bale, oo az vaghti ke ezdevâj karde ast digar kâr nemikonad.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
translate: ‫او (زن) از وقتی که ازدواج کرده است دیگر کار نمی‌کند.‬
translit: oo az zamâni ke ezdevâj karde ast digar kâr nemikonad.

text: Since they have met each other, they are happy.
translate: ‫آنها ‫از وقتی که با هم آشنا شدند خوشبخت هستند.‬
translit: az vaghti ke ânhâ bâ ham âshenâ shodand khosh-bakht hastand.

text: Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: ‫آنها ‫از وقتی بچه دار شده اند به ندرت بیرون می‌آیند.‬
translit: az vaghti bach-che dâr shode-and be nodrat birun mi-âyand.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
translate: ‫او ضمن اتو کردن تلویزیون تماشا می‌کند.‬
translit: oo ham-zamân bâ otu kardan televizion tamâshâ mikonad.

text: She listens to music while she does her work.
translate: ‫او (زن) ضمن انجام تکالیف مدرسه موسیقی گوش می‌دهد.‬
translit: oo zemne anjâme takâlife madrese musighi gush mida-had.

text: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
translate: ‫من موقعی که عینک نمی‌زنم هیچ چیز نمی‌بینم.‬
translit: man moghe-e ke eynak nemizanam hich chiz nemibinam.

text: I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: ‫من موقعی که موسیقی بلند است هیچ چیز نمی‌فهمم.‬
translit: man moghe-e ke musighi boland ast hich chiz nemifahmam.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
translate: ‫من موقعی که سرما خورده ام هیچ بویی را حس نمی‌کنم.‬
translit: man moghe-e ke sarmâ khorde-am hich bu-yee râ ehsâs nemikonam.

text: We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
translate: ‫موقعی که باران می‌بارد ما سوار تاکسی می‌شویم.‬
translit: moghe-e ke bârân mibârad mâ tâxi savâr mishavim.

text: We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
translate: ‫اگر در بخت آزمایی برنده شویم، به دور دنیا سفر می‌کنیم.‬
translit: agar dar bakht-âzmâ-yee bebarim, be dore donyâ safar mikonim.

text: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
translate: ‫اگر او زود نیاید ما غذا را شروع می‌کنیم.‬
translit: agar oo be zudi nayâyad mâ ghazâ râ shoru-e mikonim.

text: You are so lazy – don’t be so lazy!
translit: to khyli tanbali - inghadr tanbal nabâsh!

text: You sleep for so long – don’t sleep so late!
You come home so late – don’t come home so late!
translate: ‫تو خیلی دیر می‌آیی – اینقدر دیر نیا!‬
translit: to dir mi-âyee - inghadr dir nayâ!

text: You laugh so loudly – don’t laugh so loudly!
translate: ‫تو خیلی بلند می‌خندی – اینقدر بلند نخند!‬
translit: to bâ sedâye boland mikhandi - inghadr boland nakhand!

text: You speak so softly – don’t speak so softly!
translate: ‫تو آهسته حرف می‌زنی – اینقدر آهسته حرف نزن!‬
translit: to âheste harf mizani - inghadr âheste harf nazan!

text: You drink too much – don’t drink so much!
You smoke too much – don’t smoke so much!
translate: ‫تو خیلی سیگار می‌کشی – اینقدر سیگار نکش!‬
translit: to khyli sigâr mikeshi - inghadr sigâr nakesh!

text: You work too much – don’t work so much!
translate: ‫تو خیلی کار می‌کنی – اینقدر کار نکن!‬
translit: to khyli kâr mikoni - inghadr kâr nakon!

text: You drive too fast – don’t drive so fast!
translate: ‫تو خیلی تند رانندگی می‌کنی – اینقدر تند نران! ‬
translit: to khyli sari-e rânandegi mikoni - inghadr sari-e naro!
âghâye muler, dar jâye khod beneshinid!
sabr kon tâ bârân motevaghef shavad.

translate: ‫صبر کن تا من کارم تمام شود.‬
translit: sabr kon tâ man kâram tamâm shavad.

text: I’ll wait until my hair is dry.
translate: ‫من صبر می‌کنم تا موهایم خشک شوند.‬
translit: man sabr mikonam tâ muhâyam khoshk shavand.

text: I’ll wait until the film is over.
translate: ‫من صبر می‌کنم تا فیلم تمام شود.‬
translit: man sabr mikonam tâ film tamâm shavad.

text: I’ll wait until the traffic light is green.
translate: ‫من صبر می‌کنم تا چراغ راهنما سبز شود.‬
translit: man sabr mikonam tâ cherâghe râh namâ sabz shavad.

text: When do you go on holiday?
Yes, before the summer holidays begin.
translate: ‫بله، قبل از اینکه تعطیلات تابستان شروع شود.‬
translit: bale, pish az ânke ta-atilâte tâbestâni shoru-e shavad.

text: Repair the roof before the winter begins.
translate: ‫قبل از اینکه زمستان شروع شود، سقف را تعمیر کن.‬
translit: pish az ânke zemestân shoru-e shavad, saghf râ ta-a-mir kon.

text: Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
translate: ‫قبل از اینکه سر میز بنشینی، دست هایت را بشوی.‬
translit: pish az ânke sare miz beneshini, dast-hâyat râ beshuye.

text: Close the window before you go out.
translate: ‫قبل از اینکه خارج شوی، پنجره را ببند.‬
translit: pish az ânke khârej shavi, panjere râ beband.

text: Yes, after the class is over.
translate: ‫بله، بعد از اینکه کلاس تمام شد.‬
translit: bale, bad az in ke kelâse dars tamâm shod.

text: After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
translate: ‫بعد از اینکه او (مرد) تصادف کرد دیگر نتوانست کار کند.‬
translit: bad az in ke oo tasâdof kard digar natavânest kâr konad.

text: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
translate: ‫بعد از اینکه او (مرد) کارش را از دست داد به آمریکا رفت.‬
translit: bad az in ke oo kârash râ az dast dâd be âmrikâ raft.

text: After he went to America, he became rich.
translate: ‫بعد از اینکه او (مرد) به آمریکا رفت ثروتمند شد.‬
translit: bad az in ke oo be âmrikâ raft servatmand shod.

text: I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
translate: ‫من به محض اینکه ساعت زنگ بزند، بیدار می‌شوم.‬
translit: man be mahze in ke sâ-at zang bezanad, bidâr mishavam.

text: I become tired as soon as I have to study.
translate: ‫من به محض اینکه شروع به درس خواندن می‌کنم خسته می‌شوم.‬
translit: man be mahze in ke shoru-e be dars khândan mikonam khaste mishavam.

text: I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
translate: ‫به محض اینکه به سن 60 سالگی برسم دیگر کار نمی‌کنم.‬
translit: be mahze in ke be sen-ne shast sâlegi beresam digar kâr nemikonam.

text: As soon as I have a moment.
translate: ‫به محض اینکه چند لحظه فرصت پیدا کنم.‬
translit: be mahze in ke chand lahze forsat peydâ konam.

text: He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
translate: ‫او (مرد) به محض اینکه فرصت پیدا کند تلفن می‌کند.‬
translit: oo be mahze in ke forsat peydâa konad telefon mikonad.
che mod-dat shomâ kâr khâhid kard?

text: I’ll work as long as I can.
translate: ‫تا زمانی که بتوانم، کار خواهم کرد.‬
translit: tâ zamâni ke betavânam kâr khâham kard.

text: I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
translate: ‫من تا زمانی که سالم باشم کار خواهم کرد.‬
translit: man tâ zamâni ke sâlem bâsham kâr khâham kard.

text: He lies in bed instead of working.
translate: ‫او (مرد) به جای اینکه کار کند در رختخواب لم داده است.‬
translit: oo be jâye in ke kâr konad dar rakhte-khâb lam dâde ast.

text: She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
translate: ‫او (زن) به جای اینکه غذا بپزد روزنامه می‌خواند.‬
translit: oo be jâye in ke ghazâ bepazad ruznâme mikhânad.

text: He is at the bar instead of going home.
translate: ‫او (مرد) به جای اینکه به خانه برود در بار می‌نشیند.‬
translit: oo be jâye in ke be khâne beravad dar bâr mineshinad.

text: As far as I know, he lives here.
translate: ‫تا آنجا که من اطلاع دارم او (مرد) اینجا زندگی می‌کند.‬
translit: tâ ânjâ ke man et-telâ-e dâram oo injâ zendegi mikonad.

text: As far as I know, his wife is ill.
translate: ‫تا آنجا که من اطلاع دارم همسرش مریض است.‬
translit: tâ ânjâ ke man et-telâ-e dâram hamsarash mariz ast.

text: As far as I know, he is unemployed.
translate: ‫تا آنجا که من اطلاع دارم او (مرد) بیکار است.‬
translit: tâ ânjâ ke man et-telâ-e dâram oo bikâr ast.

text: I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫من خواب ماندم، وگرنه به موقع می‌رسیدم.‬
translit: man khâb mândam, vagarna be moghe miresidam.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫من به اتوبوس نرسیدم وگرنه به موقع می‌رسیدم.‬
translit: man be otobus naresidam vagarna be moghe miresidam.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫من راه را پیدا نکردم (گم شدم) وگرنه به موقع می‌رسیدم.‬
translit: man râh râ peydâ nakardam vagarna be moghe miresidam.

translate: ‫به زودی باز به دیدن ما بیایید‬
translit: be zudi bâz be molâghâte mâ biâ-yeed!

text: Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.

translit: az kojâ in mozu-e râ midânid?

text: I hope that it gets better.

translate: ‫من فکر می‌کنم که او (مرد) تلفن می‌کند.‬
translit: man fekr mikonam ke oo telefon mikonad.

text: Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.
translit: man ehtemâl midaham ke sharâb ghadimi ast.

translate: ‫به نظر من او خیلی خوش تیپ است.‬
translit: be nazare man ke oo besyâr khosh tip ast.

text: The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
translit: ra-es hatman yek dust dokhtar dârad.

text: It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
translate: ‫خیلی احتمال دارد که او دوست دختر داشته باشد.‬
translit: khyli ehtemâl dârad ke oo yek dust dokhtar dâshte bâshad.

text: He fell asleep although the TV was on.
translate: ‫با اینکه تلویزیون روشن بود، او (مرد) خوابش برد.‬
translit: bâ vojude in ke televizion row-shan bud, oo khâbash bord.

text: He stayed a while although it was late.
translate: ‫با اینکه دیروقت بود، او (مرد) مدتی آنجا ماند.‬
translit: bâ vojude in ke dir vaght bud, oo mând.

text: He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
translit: bâ vojude in ke gharâr dâshtim, oo nayâmad.

text: The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
translate: ‫تلویزیون روشن بود. با وجود این او (مرد) خوابش برد.‬
translit: televizion roshan bud. bâ vojude in oo khâbash bord.

text: It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
translate: ‫دیر وقت بود. با وجود این او (مرد) مدتی آنجا ماند.‬
translit: dir vaght bud, bâ vojude in oo mând.

text: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
translate: ‫ما با هم قرار ملاقات داشتیم. با وجود این او (مرد) نیامد.‬
translit: mâ bâ ham gharâre molâghât dâshtim, bâ vojude in oo nayâmad.

text: Although he has no license, he drives the car.
translate: ‫با وجود اینکه گواهی نامه ی رانندگی ندارد، رانندگی می‌کند‬
translit: bâ vojude in ke gavâhi-nâme-ye rânandegi nadârad, rânandegi mikonad.

text: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
translate: ‫با وجود اینکه خیابان لغزنده است، با سرعت رانندگی می‌کند.‬
translit: bâ vojude in ke khiâbân laghzande bud, bâ sorat rânandegi mikonad.

text: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
translate: ‫با وجود اینکه مست است، با دوچرخه می‌رود.‬
translit: bâ vojude in ke mast ast, bâ docharkhe miravad.

text: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
translate: ‫او (مرد) گَواهی نامه ندارد. با وجود این او (مرد) رانندگی می‌کند‬
translit: oo gavâhi-nâme nadârad. bâ vojude in oo rânandegi mikonad.

text: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
translate: ‫خیابان لغزنده است. باوجود این او (مرد) تند می‌راند.‬
translit: khiâbân laghzande ast. bâ vojude in oo tond miranad.

text: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
translate: ‫او (مرد) مست است. با وجود این با دوچرخه می‌رود.‬
translit: oo mast ast. bâ vojude in oo bâ docharkhe miravad.

text: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: ‫با اینکه او (زن) تحصیل کرده است، کار پیدا نمی‌کند.‬
translit: bâ in ke oo tahsil karde ast, kâr peydâ nemikonad.

text: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: ‫با اینکه او (زن) درد دارد، به دکتر نمی‌رود.‬
translit: bâ in ke oo dard dârad, be doktor nemiravad.

text: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: ‫با اینکه او (زن) پول ندارد، ماشین می‌خرد.‬
translit: bâ in ke oo pool nadârad, mâshin mikharad.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: ‫او (زن) تحصیل کرده است. با وجود این کار پیدا نمی‌کند.‬
translit: oo tahsil karde ast. bâ vojude in kâr peydâ nemikonad.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: ‫او (زن) درد دارد. با وجود این پیش دکتر نمی‌رود.‬
translit: oo dard dârad. bâ vojude in be doktor morâje-e nemikonad.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: ‫او (زن) پول ندارد. با وجود این یک خودرو می‌خرد.‬
translit: oo pool nadârad. bâ vojude in yek khodro mikharad.

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
translate: ‫اگرچه مسافرت خوب بود، اما خیلی خسته کننده بود.‬
translit: agarche mosâferat khub bud, ammâ khyli khaste konande bud.

text: The train was on time, but too full.
translate: ‫اگرچه قطار سر وقت آمد، اما خیلی پر بود.‬
translit: agarche ghatâr sare vaght âmad, ammâ khyli por bud.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
translate: ‫اگرچه هتل خوب و راحت بود، اما خیلی گران بود.‬
translit: agarche hotel khub-o râahat bud, ammâ khyli gerân bud.

text: He’ll take either the bus or the train.
translate: ‫او (مرد) یا با اتوبوس می‌رود یا با قطار.‬
translit: oo yâ bâ otobus miravad yâ bâ ghatâr.

text: He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translate: ‫او (مرد) یا امشب می‌آید یا فردا صبح.‬
translit: oo yâ emshab mi-âyad yâ fardâ sobhe zud.

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
translate: ‫او (مرد) یا پیش ما می‌ماند یا در هتل.‬
translit: oo yâ pishe mâ mimânad yâ dar hotel.

text: She speaks Spanish as well as English.
translate: ‫او (زن) هم اسپانیایی صحبت می‌کند و هم انگلیسی.‬
translit: oo (zan) ham espâniâ-yee va ham engelisi sohbat mikonad.

text: She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
translate: ‫او هم در مادرید زندگی کرده است و هم در لندن.‬
translit: oo ham dar mâdrid va ham dar landan zendegi karde-ast.

text: She knows Spain as well as England.
translate: ‫او هم اسپانیا را می‌شناسد و هم انگلیس را.‬
translit: oo ham espâniâ râ mishenâsad va ham engelis râ.

text: He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
translate: ‫او نه تنها احمق است، بلکه تنبل هم هست.‬
translit: oo na tanhâ ahmagh ast, balke tanbal ham hast.

text: She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translate: ‫او (زن) نه تنها زیباست بلکه باهوش هم هست.‬
translit: oo na tanhâ zibâst balke bâhush ham hast.

text: She speaks not only German, but also French.
translate: ‫او (زن) نه تنها آلمانی، بلکه فرانسوی هم صحبت می‌کند.‬
translit: oo na tanhâ âlmâni, balke farânsavi ham sohbat mikonad.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
translate: ‫من نه می‌توانم پیانو بنوازم و نه گیتار.‬
translit: man na mitavânam piâno benavâzam va na gitâr.

text: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
translate: ‫من نه می‌توانم والس برقصم و نه سامبا.‬
translit: man na mitavânam vâls beraghsam va na sâmbâ.

text: I like neither opera nor ballet.
translate: ‫من نه از آواز اپرا خوشم می‌آید و نه از رقص باله.‬
translit: man na az âvâze operâ khosham mi-âyad va na az raghse bâle.

text: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: ‫هر چه سریعتر کار کنی، زودتر کارت تمام می‌شود.‬
translit: har che sari-e-tar kâr koni, zudtar kârat tamâm mishavad.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: ‫هرچه زودتر بیایی، زودتر هم می‌توانی بروی.‬
translit: har che zud-tar biâ-yee, zud-tar ham mitavâni beravi.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: ‫هر چه سن بالا می‌رود، احساس راحت طلبی بیشتر می‌شود.‬
translit: har che sen bâlâ miravad, ehsâse râhat-talabi bishtar mishavad.

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
translate: ‫آیا تا به حال در برلین بوده اید؟‬
translit: âyâ tâ be hâl dar berlin bude-id?

text: No, I don’t know anyone here.
translit: na, man injâ kasi râ nemishenâsam.

text: a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
No, I won’t stay here much longer.
translit: na, man digar ziâd injâ nemimânam.
meghdâri digar - bishtar az in na

text: Would you like to drink something else?
No, I don’t want anything else.
No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.
Does anyone else want a coffee?
The button from the shirt is gone.
translate: ‫دکمه ی پیراهن افتاده است (گم شده است).‬
translit: dok-maye piraâhan oftâde ast (gom shode ast)

text: The boss’ computer is not working.
How do I get to her parents’ house?
translate: ‫چطور به خانه ی والدین او بروم؟‬
translit: che-gune be khâne-ye vâledaine oo beravam?

text: The house is at the end of the road.
translit: khâne dar entehâye khiâbân gharâr dârad.

text: What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
What is the title of the book?
What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?

translate: ‫تعطیلات مدرسه ی بچه‌ها چه موقع است؟‬
translit: ta-etilâte madreseye bach-che-hâ che moghe ast?

text: What are the doctor’s consultation times?
translit: oghâte visite doktor che zamân-hâyee ast?

text: What time is the museum open?
translate: ‫ساعات کاری موزه چه زمان هایی است؟‬
translit: sâ-ate kâri-e muze che zamân-hâyee ast?
